ext_descriptions.ext_description: The sc_additional_application_domain_enumeration provides predefined identifiers for the additional application domains of s.
the application domain is surface finish.

The surface_lay_and_orientation provides predefined identifiers of the surface lay as specified in table 2 of ISO 1302:2002. surface_lay_and_orientation identifiers can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.
the direction of the surface lay is perpendicular to plane of projection of view in which symbol is used.
the direction of the surface lay is parallel to plane of projection of view in which symbol is used.
the direction of the surface lay is crossed in two oblique directions relative to plane of projection of view in which symbol is used.
the direction of the surface lay is multi_directional.
the direction of the surface lay is approximately circular relative to centre of surface to which symbol applies.
the direction of the surface lay is approximately radial relative to centre of surface to which symbol applies.
the direction of the surface lay is particulate, non-directional or protuberant.

The surface_texture_characteristic_type provides predefined identifiers for the surface texture characteristic as summarized in ISO 1302:2002 and detailed in ISO 4287, ISO 12085 and ISO 13565 series. surface_texture_characteristic_type identifiers can also be used as defined in ASME B46.1-2009.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rp.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rv.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rz.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rc.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rt.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Ra.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rsk.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rku.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter RSm.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter RΔq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rmr(c).
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rδc.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness parameter Rmr.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wp.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wv.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wz.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wc.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wt.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wa.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wsk.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wku.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter WSm.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter WΔq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wmr(c).
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wδc.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness parameter Wmr.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pp.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pv.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pz.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pc.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pt.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pa.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Psk.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pku.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter PSm.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter PΔq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pmr(c).
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pδc.
the surface texture characteristic type is the structure parameter Pmr.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile motif parameter R.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile motif parameter Rx.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile motif parameter AR.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness profile motif parameter W.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness profile motif parameter Wx.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness profile motif parameter AW.
the surface texture characteristic type is the waviness profile motif parameter Wte.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rk.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rpk.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rvk.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Mr1.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Mr2.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rke.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rpke.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rcke.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Mr1e.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Mr2e.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rpq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rvq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Rmq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Ppq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Pvq.
the surface texture characteristic type is the roughness profile parameter Pmq.
The surface_texture_material_removal_condition_enumeration provides predefined identifiers as to whether removal of material is necessary or permitted.
any manufacturing process permitted.
material shall be removed.
material shall not be removed.

The surface_texture_requirement_type provides predefined identifiers for the tolerance type as specified in ISO 1302:2002. surface_texture_requirement_type identifiers can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.
the tolerance type is a unilateral upper tolerance limit.
the tolerance type is a unilateral lower tolerance limit.
the tolerance type is a bilateral upper tolerance limit.
the tolerance type is a bilateral lower tolerance limit.
A Coating_layer is a type of that identifies a layer of covering applied to a surface.
the that refers to the Coating_layer and specifies its depth. There may not be any thickness specified.
A Coating_layer shall be referred to by exactly one that identifies the coating material.

A Contact_ratio is a type of that specifies the measure of the quality of contact of a shape on a reference surface. It is expressed as the ratio between the measure of the area of contact and the measure of the area of the reference surface.
a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that is the ratio between the measure of the area of contact and the measure of the area of the reference surface.

a
that serves as the reference for the determination of a Contact_ratio.
an inherited attribute shall be the string with value 'contact ratio' for the Contact_ratio.
A Hardness is a type of that defines the hardness of a material on its surface. The Hardness represents the resistance of a surface to deformation by external forces.

ext_description.p:
the method for measuring Hardness values.
Where applicable the following values shall be used:

ul.li: 'brinell': The Hardness is measured according to the Brinell method;
'rockwell': The Hardness is measured according to the Rockwell method;
'vickers': The Hardness is measured according to the Vickers method.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the conditions under which the specified hardness_value is valid.

ext_description.p: the position where the Hardness is measured with respect to the part of interest.
ext_description.example: Core is a measuring position inside the hardened part and is measured before a quenching process.
Surface is a measuring position on an area of the hardened part and is measured after a quenching process.
ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the value that results from application of a measuring_method.

ext_description.p: the layer measured from the surface into the material where the specified Hardness applies.
ext_description.example: The layer of the hardened material after a high-frequency quenching process is an example for depth.
ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: an inherited attribute shall be the string with value 'hardness' for the Hardness.

ext_description.p:
A Standard_surface_texture_parameter is a type of
to represent a surface texture requirement as defined in ISO 1302:2002 clause 6.
ext_description.note: A surface texture requirement can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_description.p: the surface texture characteristic as summarized in ISO 1302:2002 and detailed in ISO 4287, ISO 12085 and ISO 13565 series.
ext_description.note: Surface texture characteristic can also be used as defined in ASME B46.1-2009

ext_description.p: the required value for the specific type of characteristics. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
ext_description.note: For most cases of characteristic_type, the characteristic_value is mandatory and is of the specific sub-type .

ext_description.p: additional information that is not otherwise covered by attributes of this application object. This includes the indication and interpretation of the specification limits of surface texture specified in clause 6.4.1 of ISO 1302:2002. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
ext_description.note: Additional information can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the kind of tolerance type; either unilateral or bilateral and on whether is applies to the upper or lower limit. If not specified this attribute is either no applicable for the chosen characteristic type or a default value applies as defined in ISO 1302 and associated standards.
the number of sampling lengths within the evaluation_length.

ext_description.p: the total evaluation length. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If not specified this attribute is either no applicable for the chosen characteristic type or a default value applies as defined in ISO 1302 and associated standards.
ext_description.note: evaluation length can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_description.p: the short-wave filter in the transmission band according to clause 6.5 of ISO 1302:2002. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If not specified this attribute is either no applicable for the chosen characteristic type or a default value applies as defined in ISO 1302 and associated standards.
ext_description.note: Short-wave filter can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_description.p: the long-wave filter in the transmission band according to clause 6.5 of ISO 1302:2002. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If not specified this attribute is either no applicable for the chosen characteristic type or a default value applies as defined in ISO 1302 and associated standards.
ext_description.note: Long-wave filter can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Surface_condition is a type of . A Surface_condition is a definition of a characteristic or property of a surface of an item.
A Surface_condition may be specified during the design phase of a product as an expected characteristic of the parts resulting from the manufacturing process, but it may also be documented as measured on a prototype.
Each Surface_condition is either a , a , a , a , a , or a .

ext_description.p: classification information on how the Surface_condition shall be interpreted without giving details. Where applicable the following values shall be used:

ul.li: 'calculated': The value has been calculated from a digital representation;
'designed': The value represents a value intended by the design;
'measured': The value has been measured on a manufactured part;

ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the object that is characterized by the Surface_condition.

an inverse relationship where the existence of the Surface_condition is dependent on the existence of the
that specifies the Surface_condition as its . There should be no Property_definition_representations for this Surface_condition.
A Surface_condition_association is a mechanism to associate a with an instance.
the condition of a surface that is being assigned to an instance.
the instance that is characterized by the .
A Surface_texture is a type of that represent surface texture requirements as defined in ISO 1302:2002. Surface_texture can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_description.p: specifies on whether material removal is permitted, required or not allowed as defined in ISO 1302:2002.
ext_description.note: This attribute can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_description.p: indication of the surface lay as specified in table 2 of ISO 1302:2002. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If provided, this information shall be evaluated in combination with the value of direction_reference.
ext_description.note: This attribute can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: indication of a reference plane, defined by the plane of the x and y axis of an .

ext_description.p: the direction for the surface lay case Multi-directional. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
ext_description.note: Unless otherwise specified the direction for other surface lay cases is provided by the annotation pane in which the annotation for the texture symbol is provided.

ext_description.p:
the name of the manufacturing method as defined in clause 7 of ISO 1302:2002. The value of this attribute need not be specified. This string shall not be used to specify the coating material of surface. The coating material shall be specified by
if needed.
ext_description.note: This attribute can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_description.p: the value of machining allowance as specified in clause 9 of ISO 1302:2002. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
ext_description.note: This attribute can also be used as defined in ASME Y14.36M-1996.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the set of s for this Surface_texture. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
an inherited attribute shall be the string with value 'surface texturee' the Surface_texture.

A Surface_texture_parameter is a detailed requirement of a . A Surface_texture_parameter is either a
or a
or a combination of both.
the value of the Surface_texture_parameter.

ext_description.p: the word or group of words by which the Surface_texture_parameter is referred.

example.p: Parameter names defined in ISO 4287 are sampling or evaluation length 'l', primary profile parameter 'P', roughness profile parameter 'R', and waviness profile parameter 'W'.

Parameter values defined in ISO 4287 are maximum peak height 'p', maximum valley depth 'v', maximum height 'y', mean height 'c', total height 't', arithmetical mean deviation 'a', and root mean square deviation 'q'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the that is described by the Surface_texture_parameter.
an index that specifies the name of the Surface_texture_parameter further. The parameter_index need not be specified for a particular Surface_texture_parameter.

A Tactile_appearance is a type of
that specifies the appearance of a surface of a part regarding the sense of touch.
the identifier of the Tactile_appearance. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
an inherited attribute shall be the string with value 'tactile appearance' the Tactile_appearance.

ext_description.p: the extent of the Tactile_appearance in the normal direction of the surface.
ext_description.note: The interpretation of the depth depends on the definition of the Tactile_appearance, i.e., on the contents of the attribute description.
ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: additional information about the Tactile_appearance. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Treatment_result is a type of
that is a result of a certain treatment.
the identifier of the Treatment_result. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
an inherited attribute shall be the string with value 'treatment result' the Treatment_result.
additional information about the Treatment_result.
the effects that are a consequence of the treatment. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A User_defined_surface_texture_parameter is a type of , that defines the requirement as a user specific string. A User_defined_surface_texture_parameter shall not be used as a replacement for a .
a user specific string that formulates the requirement for a .

A Visual_appearance is a type of
that specifies the appearance of a surface of a part regarding the optical impression.

ext_description.p: the identifier of the colour of the Visual_appearance.
ext_description.example: A colour can be identified using a code such as 'C130202250'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the kind of shining or the kind of reflection of the surface.
the grade of transparency of the surface. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the identifier of the Visual_appearance. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
an inherited attribute shall be the string with value 'visual appearance' the Visual_appearance.

ext_description.p: the repeatable design used for the definition of the Visual_appearance.
ext_description.example: A pattern may be used to specify the texture of a seat cover for Visual_appearance purposes.
ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the word or group of words by which the colour of the Visual_appearance is referred.
ext_description.example: A colour may be referred by a customer or by name such as 'arctic white'.
ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: An Extended_visual_appearance is a type of that specifies attributes regarding the quality visual appearance of the products and parts represented in an external geometric model.

ext_description.p: the image file that contains the of the applied texture.
the amount of refraction when looking through the object represented.
ext_description.example: the refraction_index value for the crystal is '1.4'
ext_description.p: The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: amount of lack of translucency of the object represented. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
how the image must be applied over the object. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
